TopicTitle: Flight Simulator X Steam edition and Just Flight Air Hauler addon?

Articles.Content:
Dos any one have Flight Simulator X Steam Edition and Just Flight Air Hauler addon?I have FSUICP installed safely and was woundering if the Just Flight Air Hauler addon would work fine with the FSX:SE.Is there any bugs i should know of when using Air Hauler with FSX:SE http://store.steampowered.com/app/314160

Air Hauler http://www.justflight.com/product/air-hauler-download .I heard they are coming out with a new version of Air Hauler 2 http://www.justflight.com/product/air-hauler-2-download-for-fsx-and-p3d.Help would be appreciated.
